name: Taria
description:
Hey there dungeoneer!

In this game you play as Taria, a small archer running through a dungeon filled with dangerous slimes. But Taria has a little handicap... while she constantly fires arrows, she can only walk one block at a time which is predefined, how long you press the spacebar

controls: spacebar

This game was created in 2 days for the "1-BitJam" with the theme: "1-Button"
